mapper.select: select count(*) from dictionary where type=#{type} and value=#{value}
mapper.insert: insert into dictionary(value, `key`, type, ordering) values (#{value},#{key},#{type},#{ordering})
mapper.select: select ordering from dictionary where type=#{type} order by ordering desc limit 1
select count(*) from dictionary where type=#{type} and value=#{value} and id!=#{id}
select * from dictionary where type=#{type} order by ordering asc limit #{DefaultMaxCountLimit}
select * from dictionary order by id limit #{startCount}, #{pageSize}
